Text.Page:
As if our troubles weren't enough, scouts reported seeing {@LinkCreature:29#4031#forestwalker vulcans} nearby.

Vulcans can cause enormous amounts of damage quickly. We cannot allow them to survive. Take whatever forces you feel necessary and eliminate the threat.

Vulcans are rarely found alone. Someone summoned them or loosed them. Isobel should be informed. A report shall be composed at once.

Fear not, . Your performance will be lauded appropriately.
